DispatchSchedule.title: DispatchSchedule
DispatchSchedule.description: Represents the schedule for truck dispatches from the depot.

carrier.description: The name of the carrier company.

destination.description: The final destination location for the truck.

via.description: The first stop on the route, if applicable.

trailerNumber.description: The trailer number assigned to the truck.

collectionTime.description: The scheduled collection time for the truck. Format: date-time

bayDoor.description: The bay door assigned for loading the truck.

sealNumber.description: The seal number assigned to the truck (if applicable).

scheduleNumber.description: The schedule number associated with the dispatch.

status.description: The current status of the dispatch (e.g., Waiting, Loading, Departed, Cancelled, Delayed).

/dispatchSchedules/{dispatchScheduleId}.description: Collection of dispatch schedule entries. Includes all details for each dispatch, such as carrier, destination, time, and status.
